credit_line: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
title: Hand Holding Cigar Amid Smoke
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
description: Rectangular, rounded corners and sides, featuring raised decoration of hand holding a cigar amid smoke swirls that decorate entire surface. Reverse features male in profile, blowing smoke, his curly hair blending in amid smoke swirls that decorate entire surface. Lid hinged on side. Striker on bottom.
name: Matchsafe
